subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Steroids
lead_paragraph: The Spanish rider Iban Mayo, one of the sport’s leading mountain specialists, has tested positive for the blood boosting hormone EPO, his team said in a statement.
snippet: The Spanish rider Iban Mayo, one of the sport’s leading mountain specialists, has tested positive for the blood boosting hormone EPO, his team said in a statement.
